help-file.title: "DIMENSION DOOR"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> & <player> or <mob> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
"Dimension Door" creates a short-lived extra dimensional corridor that allows the caster to teleport to any player or mob within that zone without possibility of arriving in the wrong place. This spell is distance-specific and can only be used within a certain number of rooms dependant on the proficiency of the caster.
